My views on leadership continue to evolve. Today I view my role as enabler and inspirer. People have choice every day. I want to inspire them to choose to be part of my team, to bring their best self and do their best work. Otherwise they might choose to go elsewhere; that realization really motivates me. The pressure is on me as a leader to help them be awesome.
How do think of your role as a leader? What do you expect from your leaders today?

We believe that PLI (dba QALocate.com) is the only known solution to the global problem of inaccurate physical ‘location’ data – geolocation data. PLI’s MissionProvide a worldwide standard for location intelligence precisionVisionProvide a precise structure centroid for every building structure (commercial and residential) and enable reconciliation and curation of all street addresses within the GIS and USPS data domainsStrategic Value PropositionThis is a must have for all logistics, real estate, emergency services, utilities, etc. in the very near future. Imagine how precise Amazon delivery drones will need to be. PLI is the company that will make the difference for that last 100 feet to your front door.

Compellon is transforming the traditional trial-and-error methodology of data analysis with its proprietary predictive and prescriptive analytics technology, which is currently U.S. patent pending. The Compellon20|20 platform is capable of automatically discovering, learning, and adapting in dynamic data environments, empowering companies to make fast and well-informed decisions. Compellon is proven and currently providing solutions to companies from Fortune 500 companies to small, vertically-focused organizations.The result of 30 years of research in advanced information theory, Compellon’s breakthrough prescriptive analytics engine simplifies traditional data analytics by eliminating the trial-and-error methodology of testing data against multiple statistical models.

Bulzi specializes in all-screen addressable advertising. It is the only ad platform which enables marketers to reach consumers when they are in their home or on-the-go while exposed to ads on every digital screen… connected TV, mobile, desktop, and out of home (OOH).Bulzi ad servers leverage detailed consumer attributes and profiles to realize efficient, targeted ad serving without handling personally identifiable information. Consumers are individuals. Bulzi delivers individualized advertising anonymously.

Carey is an excellent start-up and technology executive with experience and depth across a wide range of disciplines and industries. He gets deeply involved with every project he takes on and works tirelessly to achieve success.  Carey also works hard to grow and give back to his strong network of LinkedIn contacts.  Combined with his fantastic business development skills, his network has become a great asset to him and the companies at which he has worked.  Carey also gives a lot to his teams--encouraging them, communicating often, teaching often, getting folks to work well together.  Most importantly, his primary focus is always on his customers--understanding them, responding quickly to them and delivering maximum value to them.  He knows how to do all of this, while making his companies successful and, at the same time, sticking to his values and making time for family.  He's a great leader and friend.

summary: What I believe:1. The Internet has created fascinating new opportunities for business to deliver value, and consumers have more options and power than ever to influence, participate in and benefit from it.  As businesses create more purpose-driven and collaborative models, even more disruption to existing companies will occur.2. Small businesses are the fabric of our country's economy, and they drive the jobs, innovation and community bonds that we all seek. They need help to succeed and nothing is more rewarding to me than helping a small business/entrepreneur to reach a new goal or insight and gain a competitive edge (even if just temporarily), as well as provide better customer experiences. I'm an entrepreneurial thrill seeker and company builder.  I have a founder attitude, even when I join a business already underway, or take over the reigns of a company. I love to shape, strategize and invest in new ideas.  My areas of expertise are business and corporate development, technology and product strategy, marketing, sales and channel partner development. I've led many startup-to-growth companies to successfully pursue breakthrough business opportunities. I've done millions of dollars of business via LinkedIn as well!I enjoy change, new challenges and executing on new ideas; always seek bright colleagues in fast-moving, high-growth environments, where the future is ambiguous and unclear; thrive on undertaking strategic and intellectual challenges; and have a strong preference for highly entrepreneurial team environments and continuously learning and growing.Myers-Briggs Type: ENTPSpecialties: Building & Launching New Products into New Markets; Consumer Experience, UX/UI Design; Product Development; Digital Marketing; Programmatic Advertising;  Email & Social Media Marketing; Monetization & Cloud Business Models; Web Design & Development, Enterprise Sales, Business Development, Distribution & Channel Partners; Venture Capital & Private Equity
name: Carey Ransom
title: Purpose-driven, Passionate, Long-term Value Creator
